nodes.documentation:
Return value is how much REP and dispute tokens the contributor is entitled to.

   * Does not change the state, as accounting is finalized at that moment.

   * In case of partial fill, we round down, leaving some dust in the contract.
nodes.name: calculateProceeds

nodes.documentation:
Calculate fee that will be split between contract admin and
account that triggered dispute transaction.

   * In case of partial fill, we round down, leaving some dust in the contract.
nodes.name: calculateFees

nodes.documentation:
Interface of what the disputer contract should do.

 * Its main responsibility to interact with Augur. Only minimal glue methods
are added apart from that in order for crowdsourcer to be able to interact
with it.

 * This contract holds the actual crowdsourced REP for dispute, so it doesn't
need to transfer it from elsewhere at the moment of dispute. It doesn't care
at all who this REP belongs to, it just spends it for dispute. Accounting
is done in other contracts.
nodes.name: IDisputer

nodes.documentation:
This function should use as little gas as possible, as it will be called
during rush time. Unnecessary operations are postponed for later.

   * Can by called by anyone, but only once.
nodes.name: dispute

nodes.documentation:
Parent of a crowdsourcer that is passed into it on construction. Used
to determine destination for fees.
nodes.name: ICrowdsourcerParent

nodes.documentation: This should've been an interface, but interfaces cannot inherit interfaces
nodes.name: ReportingParticipant

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,contract Market,uint256,uint256[] memory,bool) external returns (contract IDisputer)

calculateFees().notice: Calculate fee that will be split between contract admin and account that triggered dispute transaction.    * In case of partial fill, we round down, leaving some dust in the contract.

calculateProceeds(address).notice: Return value is how much REP and dispute tokens the contributor is entitled to.    * Does not change the state, as accounting is finalized at that moment.    * In case of partial fill, we round down, leaving some dust in the contract.

dispute(address).notice: This function should use as little gas as possible, as it will be called during rush time. Unnecessary operations are postponed for later.    * Can by called by anyone, but only once.
